question: Which country's national football team is nicknamed as "Syli Nationale (National Elephants)"?
explanation: Guinea's national football team is nicknamed as "Syli Nationale (National Elephants)". The Guinea national football team represents Guinea in men's international football and it is controlled by the Guinean Football Federation. They have never qualified for the FIFA World Cup finals, and their best finish in the Africa Cup of Nations was second in 1976. The team reached the quarter-finals in four recent tournaments (2004, 2006, 2008, 2015), The team represents both FIFA and Confederation of African Football (CAF).
